x-sap-shortText: Manage the identities of user resources in Concur

get.description: Retrieves all users of a given company.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter string used to request a subset of resources. Only eq operator is supported for userName, employeeNumber and externalId.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: A list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to return in the response, overriding the set of attributes that would be returned by default.

parameters.name: excludedAttributes
parameters.description: A list of strings indicating the names of resource attributes to be removed from the default set of attributes to return.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: An integer indicating the desired maximum number of query results per page.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: The 1-based index of the first query result.

requestBody.description: the user identity profile to create

get.description: Retrieves a unique user based on the user's UUID.

patch.description: Updates applicable attributes in the user's identity profile.

requestBody.description: patch operations to apply on the user identity Profile

delete.description: Delete all data associated with User Profile by Id

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

PaginationServiceProviderConfigSetting.description: Details about pagination support for this service provider

defaultPageSize.description: Non-negative integer value specifying the default number of results returned in a page when a count is not specified in the query.

maxPageSize.description: Non-negative integer specifying the maximum number of results returned in a page regardless of what is specified for the count in a query.

SchemaExtension.description: Describes an extension of a schema

schema.description: The string identifier of the extension

required.description: Whether this existention is a required part of the schema

totalResults.description: The total number of results matching the client query

itemsPerPage.description: The number of query results returned in a query response page

startIndex.description: The 1-based index of the first result in the current set of query results

nextCursor.description: Can be used on the next query to return the next set of matching records for a single, unique query.

description.description: The description of the Authentication Scheme

documentationUrl.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's usage documentation

name.description: The common authentication scheme name, e.g. HTTP Basic

specUrl.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's specification

path.description: An attribute path describing the target of the operation

value.description: The value to be used within the operations.

documentationUrl.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Service Provider's help documentation

active.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the User is active.

addresses.description: Physical mailing addresses for the User.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

type.description: A label indicating the function of the address, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

dateOfBirth.description: The user's date of birth , in YYYY-MM-DD format

displayName.description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users.

type.description: A label indicating the function of the address, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

verified.description: flag to note which email has been verified by the user.

emergencyContacts.description: Emergency Contact information for the User.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

entitlements.description: The features enabled for the user

externalId.description: User identifier from the provisioning client

id.description: Unique identifier for the user - a uuid

localeOverrides.description: Support for users who want to override locale settings

preference24Hour.description: preferred time format for the user

preferenceCurrencySymbolLocation.description: preferred currency symbol location for the user

preferenceDateFormat.description: preferred date format for the user

preferenceDefaultCalView.description: preferred default calendar view for the user

preferenceEndDayViewHour.description: preferred hour setting for the end of day, 0-23

preferenceFirstDayOfWeek.description: preferred first day of the week for the user

preferenceHourMinuteSeparator.description: preferred separator between hour and minute

preferenceNegativeCurrencyFormat.description: preferred negative currency format for the user

preferenceNegativeNumberFormat.description: preferred negative number format for the user

preferenceNumberFormat.description: preferred number format for the user

preferenceStartDayViewHour.description: preferred hour setting for the start of day, 0-23

meta.description: Read only information about the User

academicTitle.description: Title signifying level of academic achievement

familyName.description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

familyNamePrefix.description: The family name prefix of the User (e.g. 'van' given the full name 'Vincent van Gogh')

formatted.description: The full name, formatted for display (e.g., 'Jensen, Barbara Jane').

givenName.description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

honorificPrefix.description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

honorificSuffix.description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

legalName.description: The legal name of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

middleInitial.description: middle initial, if the user has a middle name

middleName.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

nickName.description: The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'. This attribute SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or 'mpepperidge').

display.description: Phone number canonicalized to RFC3966 format

issuingCountry.description: Issuing country for mobile devices (type=mobile); two-letter code per ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

type.description: A label indicating the phone number's function, e.g., 'work', 'home'.

preferredLanguage.description: Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language. Generally used for selecting a localized user interface

schemas.description: List of available schemas and schema extensions

timezone.description: The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

title.description: user's job title in the company

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:e.description: Enterprise extension for a Concur user account for CTE

employeeNumber.description: Client supplied employee's number within the company, unique for the company

legalEntity.description: Legal entity the user belongs to

$ref.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the referenced user.

terminationDate.description: Termination Date, in YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format, if the employee is terminated, this can also be used to calculate the data retention period

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:s.description: SAP schema extension for IPS integration

userName.description: The name that can be used to login to CTE

messages.description: Additional messages in case of errors / warnings

active.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the company is active.

addresses.description: A physical mailing address for this company.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

defaultLanguage.description: Indicates the default language for the company.

entitlements.description: The features enabled for the company

id.description: Unique identifier for the company - a uuid

meta.description: Read only information about the Company

migrationReadyUTC.description: When the company is ready for migration

schemas.description: List of available schemas and schema extensions

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:a.description: Authentication extension for a Concur company account for CTE

allowBiometrics.description: Allow login by biometrics, e.g. TouchID, FaceID

enableLoginIPRestrictionForMobile.description: Enable login IP restriction for mobile

enableLoginIPRestrictionForMobilePasswor.description: Enable login IP restriction for mobile password

enableLoginIPRestrictionForMobileSSO.description: Enable login IP restriction for mobile SSO

enableLoginIPRestrictionForSSO.description: Enable login IP restriction for SSO

enableLoginIPRestrictionForWebPassword.description: Enable login IP restriction for web password

enableLoginIPRestrictionForWebSSO.description: Enable login IP restriction for web SSO

loginOneTimeLinkExpirationLength.description: Login One Time Link Expiration Length

numGenerationsBeforeCanReuse.description: Number of Generations Before the password can be reused

numSecurityQuestionsUsersPick.description: Number of security questions users can pick

passwordResetEmailPolicy.description: When should password reset password email shall be sent

passwordResetSupportEmail.description: The FROM address of the password or PIN reset email

restrictPasswordResetOncePerDay.description: restrict Password Reset Once Per Day

sessionIdleTime.description: Session idle time in minutes (0 = disabled)

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:d.description: Data extension for a Concur company account for CTE

isUATCompany.description: Company is used for testing and integration

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:n.description: Notification extension for a Concur company account for CTE

enabled.description: If true, notifications are enabled for the given channels

urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:s.description: SAP extension for a Concur company account for CTE

tenantIdSpend.description: Spend tenant ID for the company

tenantIdTravel.description: Travel tenant ID for the company

ResourceType.description: Describes the extension and metadata constituting a resource like a user.

endpoint.description: The resource's HTTP addressable endpoint relative to the base URL, e.g. /Users.

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found
